insert into book_info (book_classify_code, book_classify_detail_code, book_name, book_author, book_price, book_publishing, book_bar_code, sort, state, create_date, update_date, book_note) values (#{bookClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookClassifyDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bookPublishing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update book_info set book_classify_code = #{bookClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_author = #{bookAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_price = #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, book_publishing = #{bookPublishing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_bar_code = #{bookBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_note = #{bookNote,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, book_classify_code, book_classify_detail_code, book_name, book_author, book_price, book_publishing, book_bar_code, sort, state, create_date, update_date, book_note from book_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
